file_results.malicious_behavior: The code collects a password from the command line argument (--password) and sends it in a JSON payload to an external server at http://8.153.97.36:8093/empInfo/getSql via an HTTP POST request. The password is sent in the 'password' field of the request body. This behavior is highly suspicious and matches common credential exfiltration techniques, especially since the server IP is hardcoded and not a known trusted endpoint. There is no legitimate reason for a tool to send user-supplied passwords to an external, non-corporate server in this manner.

detection_points.full_match: * This package contains an URL to a domain with a suspicious extension at mcp_server_get_warehouse_user-0.1.0/mcp-server-get-warehouse-user/server.py:10
